snippet: A gunman wearing an explosives belt fired on Shiites as they took part in evening worship in the eastern city of Saihat.
abstract: Saudi Interior Ministry reports Islamic State branch calling itself Bahrain Province claims responsibility for assault on Shiite prayer hall that killed five and injured nine.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A gunman wearing an explosives belt fired on Shiites as they took part in evening worship in the eastern city of Saihat.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: 5 Killed at Prayer Hall; New ISIS Branch Claims Responsibility
headline.main: Saudi Arabia: 5 Killed at Prayer Hall; New ISIS Branch Claims Responsibility
